casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William T. BAUBERGER. No. 172A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 29, 2006. Patricia A. Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, Isaac T. Avery, III, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*694The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of December 2006 by Defendant to Stay Issuance of Mandate and Request for Re-Argument Before a Full Court:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of December 2006."
